package org.mule.providers.legstar.test.jvmquery;
import org.mule.providers.legstar.transformers.AbstractJavaToHostEsbTransformer;
import com.legstar.xsdc.test.cases.jvmquery.JVMQueryRequest;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.jvmquery.bind.JvmQueryRequestTransformers;

/**
 * LegStar/Mule Operation JVMQueryRequest to Host Byte Array Transformer.
 * 
 * <code>JvmQueryRequestToHostByteArray</code> takes a JVMQueryRequest object as input
 * and turns it into a byte array in host format (EBCDIC) ready
 * to transport to a destination Mainframe.
 * 
 * This class was generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class JvmQueryRequestToHostByteArray extends AbstractJavaToHostEsbTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a JVMQueryRequest object and result
     * will be a byte array.
     */
    public JvmQueryRequestToHostByteArray() {
        super(new JvmQueryRequestTransformers());
        registerSourceType(JVMQueryRequest.class);
    }


}
